targets.expr: node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"$job", instance=~"$node"} - node_memory_MemFree_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"$job", instance=~"$node"} - node_memory_Buffers_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"$job", instance=~"$node"} - node_memory_Cached_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"$job", instance=~"$node"}
